description:
Two years after the war, http://anidb.net/ch99125 [Shinpachi] realized that the top members of the http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] were dismissed from the police. While http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou] was commanded to resign from the Shinsengumi and marry Princess Bubbles (Gorilla princess) and http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Sougo] was commanded to commit seppuku, http://anidb.net/ch81987 [Saitou Shimaru] and http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Hijikata] were commanded to leave Edo. Hijikata is now working as a police in a village where http://anidb.net/ch12459 [Yoshida Shouyou] once set the Shouka Sonjuku school.
Source: Gintama Wiki
name: Hijikata Toushirou
